name: Trials of Earth
description: A politician, a wealthy businessman, and a priest receive a challenge from an ancient deity to save Earth from the destruction they themselves began. Erinn Ziyang, a powerful political leader, Sterling Silver, the CEO of a weapons manufacturing conglomerate, and Hugo Dumont, the devout priest of a fading world religion, have each stood idly by while the world around them crumbled. But when an exploratory drone is knocked out of orbit by a mysterious force, the three leaders must put away their pride and work together in order to save their planet.
